ovdesc.p: Application to provide the base country for Calculating combined holiday definition which can be referred to decide the rest dates in FORWARD.RATES and PERIODIC.INTEREST table. Post set-up of the Application, the system will ignore the base (local) currency-country and use the Country setup here.

desc.p: This setup along with PI.REGION will give International holiday for calculating Rest period of PERIODIC.INTEREST. This will be used instead of Local country.

p.p: Must be valid country code from COUNTRY table.

desc.p: Setup to accept the region code for getting International holiday based on which the rest period for PERIODIC.INTEREST will be calculated.

p.p: Should be a valid region of the Country specified in PI.COUNTRY. The first 2 chars should be same as the country code

desc.p: This setup along with FWD.REGION will give International holiday for calculating Rest period of FORWARD.RATES. This will be used instead of Local country.

p.p: Must be valid country code from COUNTRY table.
When FORWARD.RATES are built from PERIODIC.INTEREST then International Country and region setup of PERIODIC.INTEREST will be picked for processing.

desc.p: Setup to accept the region code for getting International holiday based on which the rest period for FORWARD.RATES will be calculated.

p.p: Should be a valid region of the Country specified in FWD.COUNTRY. The first 2 chars should be same as the country code
